Tunable.name: STOLEN_FROM_HOUSEHOLD
Tunable.description: How the Stolen From text should appear for households. e.g. "Stolen From Household: {0.String} " = Stolen From Household: Goth

Tunable.name: STOLEN_FROM_LOT
Tunable.description: How the Stolen From text should appear for non-Household lots. e.g. "Stolen From: {0.String}" = Stolen From: The Blue Velvet
